div:
Notes:
The Message resource is a special case; it is only defined for the messaging framework, and is not encountered in other contexts
The Message resource is always found in an aggregation. The resource references enterer, author, and responsible may all be included in the aggregation or left out on the basis that the recipient (and any intermediaries) are able to locate/resolve the resources independently. The former would be suitable for loosely coupled systems, and the latter for tightly coupled systems. The messaging conformance statement for an application may describe what aggregation occurs or is required here
The actual content of the data is specified per message event. The data resource is always aggregated
Event List
[%events%]
